44 
45 //==============================================================================
46 
47 SurfaceState::SurfaceState(
48  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo,
49  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& xml_surf_props)
50  : m_thermo(thermo),
51  m_ns(thermo.nSpecies()),
52  m_nT(thermo.nEnergyEqns()),
53  mv_rhoi(m_ns),
54  mv_T(m_nT),
55  m_is_surface_state_set(false),
56  mp_surf_props(NULL),
57  mp_solid_props(NULL)
58 {
59  DataSurfaceProperties data_surf_props = {
60  m_thermo,
61  xml_surf_props };
62  std::string name_surf_props;
63 
64  xml_surf_props.getAttribute(
65  "type", name_surf_props,
66  "Error in surface_properties for the gsi imput file. "
67  "Surface properties should provided. If no properties are needed "
68  "they should set to 'none'.");
69 
70  mp_surf_props = Factory<SurfaceProperties>::create(
71  name_surf_props, data_surf_props);
72 }
73 
74 //==============================================================================
75 
76 SurfaceState::~SurfaceState(){
77  if (mp_surf_props != NULL) {delete mp_surf_props;}
78  if (mp_solid_props != NULL) {delete mp_solid_props;}
79 }
80 
81 //==============================================================================
82 
83 void SurfaceState::setSurfaceState(
84  const double* const p_mass,
85  const double* const p_energy,
86  const int state_var)
87 {
88  switch(state_var){
89  case 1:
90  setSurfaceRhoi(p_mass);
91  setSurfaceT(p_energy);
92  break;
93  default:
94  throw InvalidInputError("variable set", state_var)
95  << "This variable-set is not implemented in setSurfaceState"
96  << ". Possible variable-sets are:\n"
97  << " 1: (species densities, temperature)\n";
98  }
99  m_is_surface_state_set = true;
100 }
101 
102 //==============================================================================
103 
104 void SurfaceState::getSurfaceState(
105  double* const p_rhoi,
106  double* const p_rhoie,
107  const int state_var) const
108 {
109  switch(state_var){
110  case 1:
111  for (int i_sp = 0; i_sp < m_ns; ++i_sp){
112  p_rhoi[i_sp] = getSurfaceRhoi()(i_sp);
113  }
114  for (int i_T = 0; i_T < m_nT ; ++i_T) {
115  p_rhoie[i_T] = getSurfaceT()(i_T);
116  }
117  break;
118  default:
119  throw InvalidInputError("variable get", state_var)
120  << "This variable-get is not implemented in getSurfaceState"
121  << ". Possible variable-sets are:\n"
122  << " 1: (species densities, temperature)\n";
123  }
124 }
125 
126 //==============================================================================
127 
128 void SurfaceState::setSurfaceRhoi(const double* const p_rhoi){
129  mv_rhoi = Eigen::Map<const Eigen::VectorXd>(p_rhoi, m_ns);
130 }
131 
132 //==============================================================================
133 
134 void SurfaceState::setSurfaceT(const double* const p_T){
135  mv_T = Eigen::Map<const Eigen::VectorXd>(p_T, m_nT);
136 }
137 
138 //==============================================================================
139 
140 void SurfaceState::setSolidProperties(
141  const std::string& solid_model,
142  const DataSolidProperties& data_solid_props) {
143  mp_solid_props = Factory<SolidProperties>::create(
144  solid_model, data_solid_props);
145 }
146 
147  } // GasSurfaceInteraction
148 } // Mutation
